name: Peteng 2077 IGSI Game Jam 2022
description:
Peteng 2077

(Peteng is Javenese Language means Darkness, and 2077 means the times where it happens is happened in years 2077).

A game intended for the igsi game jam 2022 event with the theme "You are controlling the environment, not the Player".

Ensure hackers are not exposed to light sources from anywhere so as not to be detected by the police.
